pyecharts.charts.basic_charts.tree
==================================

.. py:module:: pyecharts.charts.basic_charts.tree


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   pyecharts.charts.basic_charts.tree.Tree


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: Tree(init_opts: pyecharts.types.Init = opts.InitOpts(), render_opts: pyecharts.types.RenderInit = opts.RenderOpts())

   Bases: :py:obj:`pyecharts.charts.chart.Chart`


   <<< Tree diagrams >>>

   Tree diagrams are used primarily to visualize tree data structures,
   which are special hierarchical types with unique root nodes, left subtrees,
   and right subtrees.


   .. py:method:: add(series_name: str, data: pyecharts.types.Sequence[pyecharts.types.Union[pyecharts.options.TreeItem, dict]], *, zoom: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Numeric] = 1, layout: str = 'orthogonal', symbol: pyecharts.types.JSFunc = 'emptyCircle', symbol_size: pyecharts.types.Union[pyecharts.types.JSFunc, pyecharts.types.Numeric, pyecharts.types.Sequence] = 7, orient: str = 'LR', pos_top: pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric, None] = None, pos_left: pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric, None] = None, pos_bottom: pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric, None] = None, pos_right: pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric, None] = None, width: pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric, None] = None, height: pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric, None] = None, center: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Sequence[pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric]]] = None, collapse_interval: pyecharts.types.Numeric = 0, edge_shape: str = 'curve', edge_fork_position: str = '50%', is_roam: bool = False, is_expand_and_collapse: bool = True, initial_tree_depth: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Numeric] = None, label_opts: pyecharts.types.Label = opts.LabelOpts(), leaves_opts: pyecharts.types.TreeLeavesOpts = opts.TreeLeavesOpts(), tooltip_opts: pyecharts.types.Tooltip = None, itemstyle_opts: pyecharts.types.ItemStyle = None, emphasis_opts: pyecharts.types.Emphasis = None, selected_mode: pyecharts.types.Union[bool, str] = False, blur_opts: pyecharts.types.Blur = None, select_opts: pyecharts.types.Select = None)
